item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Scaling up linear programming with PDLP (84 points | 11 comments)
2. Ultra high-resolution image of The Night Watch (323 points | 90 comments)
3. Omega-3 intake counteracts symptoms of anxiety and depression in mice (56 points | 26 comments)
4. Kamal Proxy – A minimal HTTP proxy for zero-downtime deployments (138 points | 66 comments)
5. Forget ChatGPT: why researchers now run small AIs on their laptops (194 points | 134 comments)
6. Kraftful (YC S19) is hiring a founder engineer ( | hide)
7. Mount Unix system into Common Lisp image (34 points | 5 comments)
8. Visualizing Weather Forecasts Through Landscape Imagery (538 points | 52 comments)

10. Critical Exploit in MediaTek Wi-Fi Chipsets: Zero-Click Vulnerability (208 points | 69 comments)
11. Show HN: Put this touch sensor on a robot and learn super precise tasks (342 points | 61 comments)
12. What 10k Hours of Coding Taught Me: Don't Ship Fast (13 points | 5 comments)
13. Scientists find new blood group after 50-year mystery (24 points | 2 comments)
14. The Gravo-Thermal Catastrophe (37 points | 9 comments)

16. How do archivists package things? The battle of the boxes (131 points | 19 comments)
17. Cold war spy satellites and AI detect ancient underground aqueducts (70 points | 5 comments)
18. Gibbons move with rhythm and intention. Dare we say style? (5 points | discuss)
19. Counting Sheeps with Contracts in Python (18 points | 10 comments)
20. MemoRAG – Enhance RAG with memory-based knowledge discovery for long contexts (166 points | 29 comments)
21. Remains of Egyptian army barracks and a bronze sword unearthed by archaeologists (26 points | 3 comments)
22. Porsche's idea for a six-stroke internal combustion engine (125 points | 260 comments)
23. Linux/4004: booting Linux on Intel 4004 for fun, art, and no profit (513 points | 132 comments)
24. Kubesafe: Never run Kubernetes commands on the wrong cluster again (57 points | 32 comments)
25. Governor Newsom signs landmark bill to protect kids from social media addiction (53 points | 92 comments)
26. The Collapse of Self-Worth in the Digital Age (161 points | 122 comments)
27. Reactive Relational Algebra (158 points | 30 comments)
28. Show HN: AIQ – A no-frills CLI for embeddings and text classification (78 points | 4 comments)
29. Gaining access to anyones Arc browser without them even visiting a website (1313 points | 445 comments)
30. CuPy: NumPy and SciPy for GPU (341 points | 97 comments)
